servinfo.title: Engine and Emission Control System Check

attention3.ptxt: Refer to items under checking procedure for details of each step.

testgroup.title: DTC / freeze frame data check, record and clearance

test1.ptxt: Check for DTC (current and pending DTC).

testgroup.question: Is there any DTC(s)?

action.ptxt: Print DTC and freeze frame data or write them down and clear them by referring to DTC Clearance:J24B , and go to Step 3.
Repair or replace faulty part, and go to Step 11.
Repair or replace faulty part, and go to Step 11.

testgroup.title: Rechecking and recording DTC / freeze frame data

test1.ptxt: Recheck for DTC (current and pending DTC) and freeze frame data.

testgroup.question: Is there any DTC(s)?

testgroup.title: Rechecking and recording DTC / freeze frame data

test1.ptxt: Recheck for DTC (current and pending DTC) and freeze frame data.

testgroup.question: Is there any DTC(s)?

testgroup.title: Engine basic inspection and engine symptom diagnosis

test1.ptxt: Perform engine basic inspection and engine symptom diagnosis.

testgroup.question: Is there any faulty condition?

action.ptxt: Check and repair faulty part(s), and go to Step 11.
Check and repair faulty part(s), and go to Step 11.

test1.ptxt: Check for intermittent problems by referring to “Intermittent Problem Check”.

action.ptxt: Repair or replace faulty part(s), and go to Step 11.

testgroup.title: Final confirmation test
testgroup.question: Is there any problem symptom, DTC or abnormal condition?

servinfosub.title: Step 1: Customer Complaint Analysis
servinfosub.ptxt: Record details of the problem (failure, complaint) and how it occurred as described by the customer. For this purpose, use of such an inspection form will facilitate collecting information required for proper analysis and diagnosis.

attention3.ptxt: This form is a standard sample. It should be modified according to conditions characteristic of each market.

servinfosub.title: Step 2: DTC / Freeze Frame Data Check, Record and Clearance
servinfosub.ptxt: First, check DTC (current and pending DTC).
If DTC is indicated, print it and freeze frame data or write them down and then clear them.

servinfosub.title: Step 3 and 4: Visual Inspection
servinfosub.ptxt: As a preliminary step, be sure to perform visual check of the items that support proper function of engine.

servinfosub.title: Step 5: Trouble Symptom Confirmation

ptxt.emph: In case that there is no DTC at Step 2:

servinfosub.ptxt: Based on information obtained in Step 1: Customer Complaint Analysis and Step 2: DTC / Freeze Frame Data Check, Record and Clearance , confirm trouble symptoms.

ptxt.emph: In case that there is any DTC at Step 2:

servinfosub.ptxt: Recheck DTC according to “DTC Confirmation Procedure” described in each DTC troubleshooting.

servinfosub.title: Step 6 and 7: Rechecking and Recording DTC / Freeze Frame Data
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC Check:J24B for checking procedure.

servinfosub.title: Step 8: Engine Basic Inspection and Engine Symptom Diagnosis

s1.ptxt: In case there is no faulty part found in inspection procedure of “Engine basic inspection”, perform Engine Symptom Diagnosis:J24B based on symptom found in vehicle checking in the following steps.

servinfosub.title: Step 9: Troubleshooting for DTC
servinfosub.ptxt: Perform applicable DTC troubleshooting and repair or replace faulty parts.

servinfosub.title: Step 10: Intermittent Problem Check

ptxt.emph: In case that there is no DTC at Step 2:
In case that there is any DTC at Step 2:

servinfosub.ptxt: Check parts related to detected DTC (e.g., wire harness, connector, etc.).

servinfosub.title: Step 11: Final Confirmation Test
servinfosub.ptxt: Confirm that the problem symptom has gone and engine is free from any abnormal conditions. If what has been repaired is related to DTC, clear DTC once, perform DTC confirmation procedure and confirm that no DTC is indicated.
